representation_information.name: MBOXCL Email Format
representation_information.description: MBOXCL is one of the MBOX family of related file formats used for holding collections of email messages within a single file. MBOXCL files add a greater-than sign ( > ) before the "From " at the start of a line ( >From ) as well as uses the 'Content Length:' header to identify the start of a new message.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
